TEXT.TITLE: UNC <UNC> TO CHANGE STATE OF INCORPORATION
TEXT.BODY: UNC Inc said its board has approved a change in state of incorporation to Delaware from Virginia, subject to approval by shareholders at the April 24 annual meeting. It said it expects to make the change around April 30. Reuter
